rationale: These stories form a coherent 'Secure Onboarding & Navigation' theme: NFR-001 establishes Node.js/Express/SQLite foundation with seeding (admin HR user + samples). US-009 adds login/logout endpoints/sessions (depends on NFR-001). NFR-004 enforces HR/Employee permissions via middleware/audits (depends on US-009). US-999 integrates role-based dashboard/sidebar nav (depends on US-009/NFR-004). Order: Foundation (tech/seeding) → Auth → RBAC → User-facing nav. Enables testing: Login → Role-specific dashboard with links/logout, audits on unauthorized access, npm test passes. Delivers secure MVP entry point per Vision, unlocking future features like directory search.
